title: Effigy Mounds National Monument: Volunteer
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Volunteer            Volunteer        National Park Week / Earth Day Take Pride In America Volunteers at Effigy Mounds. NPS Photo        Current Volunteer Opportunities        Although there may not be any current volunteer openings listed at this time, there may still be opportunities to volunteer at our park in the interpretation, cultural resource, maintenance, natural resource, or administration departments. Please call the Park Volunteer Coordinator at 563-873-3491 ext. 202 for more information.   Link to a Volunteer Application       Volunteers with bags of garlic mustard collected at Effigy Mounds National Monument. NPS Photo
